short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension enhances user experience for job features.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: This extension supports accessing the job features and monitor the applications. User can categorize and mange the details on a need to basis. The applications can be looked up for later use as well. Recruiters can find it handy to match requirements that they receive on daily basis and take appropriate decisions for the follow up.
